item.title: Train network
item.description: De informatie die via deze pagina wordt aangeboden, kan onvolkomenheden van allerlei aard bevatten. "Combinant" staat niet in voor de geschiktheid, betrouwbaarheid, tijdigheid of nauwkeurigheid van de informatie. De informatie wordt geleverd en weergegeven zonder enige vorm van garantie. U dient steeds de operator ter zake te raadplegen. De website van de operator vindt u in de kolom "Operator".

item.title: Home
item.description: Combinant (Combined Terminal Antwerp) is an open access railterminal for intermodal transport, in the harbor of Antwerp. map Check out our trainnetwork

item.title: Terms
item.description: General These user stipulations apply to the website "combinant.be". This website has been created and is being managed by "Combinant". By using this website you commit yourself to comply with the user stipulations. Intellectual rights of ownership The texts, drawings, pictures, movies, images, data, databases, software, designations, trade- and domain names, brands, logo’s and other constituents of this site are protected by intellectual rights and belong to "Combinant" or third persons.

item.title: opening hours Christmas and new year
item.description: Dear Customers, The terminal will beclosed on following days ; Saturday 24th December 2016 Monday 26th December 2016 Saturday 31th December 2016 Monday 2nd January 2017 All other days the temrinal is open during normal hours. From all the combinant team we wishes you a happy new year.

item.title: Start Fast Gate
item.description:
Beste gebruikers, Vanaf heden is het mogelijk om uw administratieve aanmelding gecombineerd met een slotplanning op voorhand te doen. Hierdoor bespaart U tijd bij aankomst op de terminal aangezien u al een bezoeknummer hebt ontvangen voor aankomst. In bijlage vind U meer detail over de werking hiervan. Als U hiermee wenst te starten kan U zich registreren. Wel aangeven dat het voor de fastgate is.
Handleiding fast gate 1 0 website

item.title: Direct connection towards Busto
item.description: Dear Customer, As from September 2013, Hupac will organise 4x per week a roundtrip between Combinant and Busto. Please find below the flyer.

item.title: HOYER takes stake in Combinant
item.description: HOYER takes stake in Antwerp’s Combinant terminal Hamburg logistics business expands its European intermodal network Hamburg – August 7th, 2013– Internationally active logistics provider HOYER, with its headquarter in Hamburg, is continuing to build up its intermodal activities in terminals. As part of this drive, HOYER has acquired an interest in the Antwerp Combinant terminal held by Belgium’s Inter Ferry Boats (IFB). This acquisition reinforces the Hamburg company’s already existing presence in one of Europe’s most important transport hubs for the chemicals industry.

item.title: Additional roundtrip Verona train
item.description: Dear users, As from June the 4th the number of roundtrips towards Verona will be increased from 3 towards 4 roundtrips per week. In annex you find the flyer of Hupac/Cemat for this connection. Please do not hesitate to contact them for further information. Combinant nv

item.title: New train connection Combinant - Busto
item.description: Dear All, As from 11 March 2013, Hupac started up a daily direct connection between Combinant and Busto. This connection will have 5 roundtrips per week and will have a A - C connection with Italy. Closing at Combinant is foreseen at 20u45 from Monday till Friday. Pick up at Combinant is foreseen on Monday from 10AM and from Tuesday till Friday at 06AM. Please contact Hupac for further details. See flyer attached.

item.title: Start Novara trein
item.description: Beste gebruikers, Vanaf Januari 2013 heeft IFB de trein overgenomen van Combinant naar Novara. Deze trein zal 5x in de week rijden. Aankomst voorzien op Maandag, Dinsdag, Woensdag, Donderdag en Vrijdag. Vertrek voorzien op Maandag, Dinsdag, Wioensdag, Donderdag en Zaterdag. Voor alle informatie mbt deze trein, gelieve contact op te nemen met IFB. lode.de.coster@interferryboats.be Met vriendelijke groeten, Combinant nv

item.title: Start up Novara train
item.description: Dear Users, As from January 2013, IFB started with a daily connection from Combinant towards Novara. Departures foreseen on Monday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday and Saturday. Arrivals foreseen on MOnday, Tuesday, Wednesday, Thursday and Friday. Please contact IFB for further information : lode.de.coster@interferryboats.be Best regards, Combinant nv

item.title: opening hours end year 2012
item.description: Dear all, The terminal will be opened on; Monday 24 December 2012 between 06.00 and 13.30 Monday 31 December 2012 between 06.00 and 13.30 The terminal will be closed on; Tuesday 25 December 2012 Tuesday 01 January 2013 Please check with the different operators for cancelations of trains. Combinant nv

item.title: UIRR and DG move visit's Combinant
item.description: UIRR in cooperation with Combinant, an open-access transhipment terminal in Antwerp, organised a half-day event on 4 September for DG MOVE officials to familiarise them with the latest developments of European road-rail Combined Transport.

item.title: General Strike in Belgium on monday 30th January 2012
item.description: Dear all, We have been informed that the strike announced on Monday will also be followed in the ports. This has an impact on the total port area and all Companies. Due to this strike we have no other solution then to close the terminal on Monday. We are sorry for this inconvience. Combinant NV

item.title: Strike in Belgium
item.description: Dear All, Please be informed that on Monday the 30th of January, there is a general strike announced in Belgium. At this point we do not know what the impact will be on our Terminal. We will keep you informed as soon as possible. Combinant nv

item.title: Combinant goes twitter
item.description: Dear all, As from now Combinant can be followed at twitter. Follow us for real time information and last updates. Best regards, Combinant nv @combinant CLICK HERE for direct link towards twitter

item.title: Opening hours end of year 2011
item.description: Dear costumers, The terminal will be closed on following dates; Saturday the 24th of December Monday the 26th of December Saturday the 31st of December The terminal will be open on Monday the 2nd of January 2012 between 08 am and 3 pm. Best regards, Combinant nv

item.title: New train connection Antwerp - Barcelona
item.description: Dear all, Message from Hupac. "Dear customers, Please find attached our flyer concerning the new shuttle connection Ant- werp <=> Barcelona that will replace the current service Antwerp <=> Perpignan." Best regards, Combinant nv Flyer antwerp barcelona View more documents from Combinant.

item.title: access towards Combinant
item.description: Antwerp Scheldelaan (N101) will receive new asphalt pavement The Roads and Traffic Agency will start on Monday, October 3 with asphalting work on the N101 Scheldelaan at Zandvliet (Antwerp). The present road from the northern land bridge to the Antwerpsebaan is in poor condition and need replacing. The works to Scheldelaan starting Oct. 3 at 6 am Monday morning until Friday 14 October. l the Agency starts the road construction between Antwerpsebaan and Noordland bridge.

item.description: Beste klant, Gelieve te noteren dat de terminal gesloten zal zijn op maandag 15 augustus en dit wegens feestdag. Met vriendelijke groeten, Combinant nv

item.description: Dear Customers, Please note that the terminal will be closed on monday the 15th of August and this due to bank holiday. Best regards, Combinant nv

item.title: Terminal closed on June 2nd and June 13th
item.description: Dear Customer, Please note that the terminal will be closed on June 2nd and June 13th and this due reason of Bank Holidays. Best regards, Combinant nv

item.description: Dear All, Please note that the terminal will be closed on November the 1st and 11th and this due Bank holidays. Best regards, Combinant nv

item.title: Combinant on ATV
item.description: "The new railterminal 'Combinant', in the harbor of Antwerp, next to BASF, was officialy opened today. The new terminal should keep more containers of the road." Bron: http://www.atv.be/item/combinant

item.title: Combinant on the VTM News
item.description: "A new railterminal was presented in the harbour of Antwerp. It loads containers on a train and keeps them from the road. The demand for such a terminal is big." Source: http://www.vtm.be/nieuws/binnenland/38460
